strategies.people_strategy: Cross-train Database Administration team members, maintain backup personnel, and document critical procedures.
strategies.technology_strategy: Enable daily encrypted backups, replication, and verified restore procedures for Database Administration data.
strategies.site_strategy: Activate remote work, use alternate workspace, and reroute operations for Database Administration.
strategies.vendor_strategy: Maintain dual vendors, pre-approved SLAs, and escalation paths for Database Administration dependencies.
strategies.vulnerability_strategy: Identify single points of failure in Database Administration, add redundancies, and perform quarterly drills.
